market_context: All three pillars align BEARISH: (1) Node shows distribution pattern, (2) Price broken below SMA 20 with bearish EMA cross and negative MACD, (3) News mixed with yen carry unwind. Only 1 confirming signal (RSI oversold) but rules explicitly state oversold can get MORE oversold in downtrends. Need 2+ confirming signals for any directional trade. With 7 opposing signals and strong bearish alignment across all metrics, no_trade is the disciplined choice.
